duties_responsibilities.duty: Installation of fire life safety and other low voltage systems in medium and large commercial buildings.
Program or are experienced with programing low voltage systems including fire alarm, nurse call, access control, security, or CCTV.
Execute the installation project plan provided and resolve field problems through research of alternatives.
Coordinate project activities with other trades at the work locations to optimize installation time and meet code requirements.
Communicate and effectively interact with other contractors and building owners and assist customers on-site with questions and concerns.
Read and interpret blueprints, diagrams, submittals, specifications, software/systems programs, schematics, and operational product manuals.
Identify out of scope requests by the contractor or customer and notify management of pending changes.
Assist with suggested solutions for an efficient installation to complete scope and effectively communicate project status to management.
Complete all appropriate company paperwork as required.
Meet requirements in relation to background and driving record and proficient in the use and application of industry-related equipment including MS Office.
